C

CHOKE_MESSAGE - Static variable in class Message
 
cleanup() - Method in class Piece
If a piece has been completed, verified, and written to the disk, This method should be called in order to remove a reference to the temporary buffer so that the garbage collector can get rid of this space as soon as a piece is done.
clearBuffer() - Method in class Piece
